item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.artisan_:
Saves you a lot of experience.
Also allows you to create advanced materials.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.crescent: Reduces the required Aureal depending on the time of day. Also allows the creation of magical charms.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.crimson_: Heavily decreases the amount of required souls
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.elementa: Allows the creation of elemental items.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.divine_p: Allows the creation of celestial items.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.maledict: Allows the creation of cursed items.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.soul_cri: Completely removes the essence requirement for one ritual
